I don't like Canada. Too strict laws on owning fossils (though you can collect certain fossils, they technically belong to the country), too strict laws on biotech (one of the main reasons I want to move to the US is because it allows you to own GM organisms), and also seems pretty boring.

topics.body:
Fun fact
When Greeks revolted against the Ottomans and won their independence,
 the Ottomans executed the head of the Orthodox Church and dumped his corpse into the Bosphorus
This is funny because Turks always complain about Europeans being bad
when they had worse forms of slavery, for longer,
and tried to wipe out the Armenians
